name: Steve (AzitomyMax)
description:
I ported the no internet chrome dinosaur (Steve) to itch.io

I have fun!

Oh and btw I might make a multiplayer version but you gotta pay at least $3.00 to buy it...

I can't figure out how to do file downloads so just install the game from this link --> https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1034104294099669083/1034185949703315517/i...

and I also have no idea why the play in browser version is glitched but the downloaded version is ok
